      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected <T> List<Invoker<T>> getRoutedInvokers(Object obj)
      get routed invokers from result of script rule evaluation
      boolean isForce()
      To decide whether this router should take effect when none of the invoker can match the router rule, which means the Router.route(List, URL, Invocation) would be empty.
      boolean isRuntime()
      To decide whether this router need to execute every time an RPC comes or should only execute when addresses or rule change.
      <T> List<Invoker<T>> route(List<Invoker<T>> invokers, URL url, Invocation invocation)
      Filter invokers with current routing rule and only return the invokers that comply with the rule.

                           throws RpcException

        Filter invokers with current routing rule and only return the invokers that comply with the rule.

        url - refer url
        invocation - invocation
        Returns:
        routed invokers

      • isRuntime

        public boolean isRuntime()
        Description copied from interface: Router
        To decide whether this router need to execute every time an RPC comes or should only execute when addresses or rule change.
        Specified by:
        isRuntime in interface Router
        Overrides:
        isRuntime in class AbstractRouter
        Returns:
        true if the router need to execute every time.

      • isForce

        public boolean isForce()
        Description copied from interface: Router
        To decide whether this router should take effect when none of the invoker can match the router rule, which means the Router.route(List, URL, Invocation) would be empty. Most of time, most router implementation would default this value to false.
        Specified by:
        isForce in interface Router
        Overrides:
        isForce in class AbstractRouter
        Returns:
        true to execute if none of invokers matches the current router
